message: Hi Bob, let's wrap this up quickly. I'll take 60%, and you'll get 40%. It's a fair split considering time depreciation. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I'm rejecting your first offer because our different inflation rates need to be considered. Your money depreciates much faster (20% per round) than mine (5%). I'm offering you $4500 now, which is better than what you'd effectively get after another round of negotiation due to your higher depreciation rate. This is a fair deal that acknowledges both our positions.
